name: Ahebban Kingdom (Idle Game)
description:
Ahebban Kingdom(To build a kingdom), is a game where you must create, expand and conquer your neighbouring counts, dukes, kingdoms and empires. The game takes heavy inspiration from idle games and strategy games such as "Crusader Kings 3".

The game was made for my universities game jam where we had 7 days in teams or solo, I went solo for this Jam. All assets are free use and/or created by myself.  I hope you enjoy my first completed Jam!
